Name: Gorou
Title: "Canine Warrior" Gorou
Desc: The leader of the pack, leading the soldiers onward!
Source: Reward for inviting Gorou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

C116061.Name: General's War Banner
C116061.Desc: Your party's characters deal +1 $[K106].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color> (Can stack, can stack till 3 Rounds)

K106.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>
K106.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

C116062.Name: General's Glory
C116062.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K106]. If your party has 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo</color> characters, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

C111.Name: Crystallize
C111.Desc: Grants <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 $[K6] point</color> to your active character. (Can stack. Max 2 points.)

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
